src:
Lalatović: Krivo mi je zbog penala, ali šta reći posle 4:0
02 Nov 2019, 17:14 by Darko
Trener fudbalera Vojvodine Nenad Lalatović rekao je da je Partizan zasluženo i ubedljivo pobedio, kao i da je današnja igra bila najlošije izdanje bilo koje njegove ekipe na gostovanju protiv crno-belih.
– Krivo mi je što nismo ušli u meč onako kako sam očekivao. Krivo mi je i zbog penala, ali šta reći posle 4:0?! Partizan je danas bio bolji. Nikada nijedna ekipa koju sam vodio nije odigrala ovako i ovo je sigurno najlošije izdanje bilo kog mog tima protiv Partizana, rekao je Lalatović novinarima posle utakmice, prenosi Beta.
Vojvodina je danas u gostima izgubila od Partizana sa 4:0, a Lalatović je istakao da je nemoguće da se bilo koja ekipa dostojno suprotstavi Partizanu i Crvenoj zvezdi koji imaju znatno veći finansijski i igrački fond.
– Nedostajala je duel igra, ne možete da bude toliko daleko od igrača, da im date prostor… Nekako kao da je ušao strah u moje igrače. Ovde inostrani igrači prave veliku razliku i to su prednosti Partizana i Crvene zvezde, dodao je Lalatović.
Upitan da li šta zamera svojim igračima, Lalatović je kazao da nema šta da zameri.
– Ovo je sličan tim kao i prošle godine. Ja mnogo dajem sebe i tražim isto to od njih, ali mi smo tek na početku i mnoge stvari treba da se promene. Ova ekipa je prošle sezone bila deveta, a sada smo treći i jako sam zadovoljan sa osvojenim bodovima u dosadašnjem toku sezone. Mi ipak našu priliku, ako želimo u Evropu, treba da tražimo protiv ekipa sličnih kvaliteta. To je sve do glava igrača, na kojima oni moraju da porade, rekao je trener Vojvodine.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Lalatovic: I'm sorry about the penalty, but what to say after 4-0
02 Nov 2019, 16:14 by Darko
Vojvodina football coach Nenad Lalatovic said that Partizan deservedly and convincingly won, and that today's game was the worst edition of any of his team away against the black and white.
- I'm sorry we didn't enter the match as I expected. I'm also sorry for the penalty, but what to say after 4-0? Partizan was better today. Never has any team I led played like this and this is certainly the worst issue of any of my teams against Partizan, Lalatovic told reporters after the game, Beta reports.
Vojvodina lost to Partizan 4-0 away today, and Lalatovic emphasized that it is impossible for any team to adequately stand against Partizan and Red Star, which have a significantly larger financial and player pool.
- Missing a duel game, you can't be that far away from the players, give them space ... It's kind of like fear has entered my players. The foreign players make a big difference here and that is the advantages of Partizan and Red Star, added Lalatovic.
Asked if he was offending his players, Lalatovic said he had nothing to complain about.
- This is a similar team to last year. I give myself a lot and ask for the same from them, but we are just at the beginning and many things need to change. This team was ninth last season and now we are third and I am very pleased with the points scored so far this season. However, if we want to go to Europe, we should seek our opportunity against teams of similar quality. That is down to the heads of the players, on which they have to work, said the coach of Vojvodina.
